title: Authentication & Authorization
description: Secure login via Firebase with JWT-based API access and role-based control.

title: Find Blood Donors Easily
description: Filter donors by blood group, district, and upazila with responsive search.

title: Smart Location Filtering
description: Upazila options dynamically appear based on district selection.

title: Role-Based Dashboards
description: Separate dashboards for Admin, Volunteer, and Donor with custom privileges.

title: CRUD for Donation Requests
description: Donors can create, edit, delete requests; Admins manage all requests with status updates.

title: Blog Publishing System (CMS)
description: Volunteers/Admins can create, update, and delete formatted blog posts with Jodit Editor.

title: Dashboard Statistics
description: Admin dashboard includes: total users, total requests, and funds raised.

title: Donation Status Workflow
description: Statuses like pending, inprogress, done, and canceled are managed by Admin/Volunteers.

title: Optimized API Requests
description: All GET endpoints use TanStack Query with caching and refetching.

title: Pagination and Filtering
description: Efficient list management with pagination and filters (status, role).

title: Smart Notifications
description: All interactions are confirmed using SweetAlert2 instead of native alerts.

title: JWT-Protected Routes
description: User sessions persist with secure localStorage and auto re-authentication.

title: Donation Page with Stripe
description: Secure funding and payment processing via Stripe; donation history is saved.

title: Responsive UI
description: Fully responsive design using Tailwind CSS and daisyUI, optimized for all screen sizes.

title: Environment Variables & Secure Deployment
description: All credentials are secured via .env files. Hosted using Netlify & Render.
